Foundation-Jekyll

The awesomeness of Foundation 6... powered by Jekyll


Download (v. 1.5.0) Download

About Foundation-Jekyll

This boilerplate was created as a starting point to use Foundation & Jekyll to create static websites. There aren't many (if any) Foundation & Jekyll boilerplates, so I created one. The structure is geared more towards building static sites and prototypes, not just blogs. Hopefully you'll find it as useful as I do.
